archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
API Gateway
• Purpose: Single entry point for all API requests with centralized management • Functions: Request routing, load balancing, API versioning, request/response transformation • Features: Protocol translation (REST to SOAP), caching, throttling, circuit breakers • Technology: Kong, AWS API Gateway, Azure API Management, or custom solutions • Benefits: Simplified client integration, centralized policy enforcement, reduced complexity
